author: juergen
msg: The lock and security store (child and parent) do now support a RevisionDescriptor in their interface. Mostly this is set (currently) to null. See seperate e-mail.

author: remm
msg: - Get the content type from the request headers submitted by the client,
instead of doing a lookup in the MIME table of the webserver.
